option.od: print the help message and exit.
apply smoothing to the image when it is rendered in the rPlot document.
set the width of the image in the rPlot document to width units.
set the height of the image in the rPlot document to height units.
input image filename. If this is omitted the image will be read from standard input.

synopsis.p: Convert an XML image representation to an rPlot document.

description.p: Convert an XML image representation to an rPlot document.
The rPlot document is written to standard output.

example.description: Convert XML file inp.xml to the rPlot file out.rplot.
